channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: WishTender - Creators- Get gifts from your fans!
item.description: The safest and most flexible universal wishlist for content creators. Easily list items and get funds from fans. With WishTender you can: ✅ Get cash for your gifts ✅ Send photo thank-you messages ✅ 34+ countries Sex Worker Friendly!
item.content:encoded: The safest and most flexible universal wishlist for content creators. Easily list items and get funds from fans. With WishTender you can: ✅ Get cash for your gifts ✅ Send photo thank-you messages ✅ 34+ countries Sex Worker Friendly!

item.title: AVDA: Find Jobs & Careers - An easy, resume-free way to find and apply for jobs
item.description: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.
item.content:encoded: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.

item.title: MindGarden - Fun, simple meditation that actually sticks
item.description: Get 1% happier every day through daily gratitudes, mood checks & meditation that you'll actually stick with. Grow/collect beautiful plants and at the end of each month cultivate a beautiful calendar (your MindGarden).
item.content:encoded: Get 1% happier every day through daily gratitudes, mood checks & meditation that you'll actually stick with. Grow/collect beautiful plants and at the end of each month cultivate a beautiful calendar (your MindGarden).

item.title: Glitch Image Generator - A generative tool to create glitchy images
item.description: A generative tool which allows you to create and save unique glitchy images. ⚡️
item.content:encoded: A generative tool which allows you to create and save unique glitchy images. ⚡️

item.title: Clips by Riverside.fm - You record once, we help you reach everyone
item.description: Clips is a way to transform your long-form content into multiple pieces of short-form content. Easily sharable on social media to reach more people with the same effort. You record once, we help you reach everyone!
item.content:encoded: Clips is a way to transform your long-form content into multiple pieces of short-form content. Easily sharable on social media to reach more people with the same effort. You record once, we help you reach everyone!

item.title: Xtra Clipboard - Boost your productivity with clipboards
item.description: Xtra Clipboard is a developer-friendly clipboard manager that is super fast and easy to use. Everything you copy in your device can be found in the clipboard history. It smartly sorts texts, websites, and code snippets separately.
item.content:encoded: Xtra Clipboard is a developer-friendly clipboard manager that is super fast and easy to use. Everything you copy in your device can be found in the clipboard history. It smartly sorts texts, websites, and code snippets separately.

item.title: Quest NFT Platform - Convert your social media posts into NFTs for free in 2 mins
item.description: We have built a super-easy way for Creators, Brands, and Communities to create NFTs straight from your social media channels for free and in under 2 minutes!
item.content:encoded: We have built a super-easy way for Creators, Brands, and Communities to create NFTs straight from your social media channels for free and in under 2 minutes!

item.title: Bouncebuster by Overloop - Real-time email verifier
item.description: Bouncebuster is a real-time email verifier that helps you fight bounce & increase email deliverability. Verify email addresses before sending and protect your domain reputation.
item.content:encoded: Bouncebuster is a real-time email verifier that helps you fight bounce & increase email deliverability. Verify email addresses before sending and protect your domain reputation.

item.title: Hexometer 3.0 - The most comprehensive website monitoring app
item.description: Get 24/7 peace of mind and catch website issues before they impact your business.
item.content:encoded: Get 24/7 peace of mind and catch website issues before they impact your business.

item.title: Slidekick - AI-powered slide deck builder, powered by GPT-3
item.description: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.
item.content:encoded: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.

item.title: Monq AIOps platform - World’s first topology-based AI-Ops automation platform
item.description: Monq is the world’s only self-hosted freemium platform for automated data collection and analysis. It turns your observability into proactive monitoring, helping IT teams prevent possible outages while minimizing costs and efforts.
item.content:encoded: Monq is the world’s only self-hosted freemium platform for automated data collection and analysis. It turns your observability into proactive monitoring, helping IT teams prevent possible outages while minimizing costs and efforts.

item.title: Search Party by Something Good - A fun, fast way to pick a Christmas movie together
item.description: Search Party by Something Good makes finding a Christmas movie together fun and fast.
item.content:encoded: Search Party by Something Good makes finding a Christmas movie together fun and fast.

item.title: Herd Social - Ditch the highlight reel, find real friends instead
item.description: Herd is a social platform that helps you find friends. Each week, we match members through their shared interests in a group chat & photo feed. We have 0 metrics, making it easy to express yourself authentically. The app is free to use globally on iOS.
item.content:encoded: Herd is a social platform that helps you find friends. Each week, we match members through their shared interests in a group chat & photo feed. We have 0 metrics, making it easy to express yourself authentically. The app is free to use globally on iOS.

item.title: FlixGem by Polymer Search - Discover top Netflix hidden gems instantly
item.description: We built the best way to find hidden gems on Netflix: 💯 Only top-rated movies and shows are included. No junk 🔍 The only way to explore thousands of attributes 🎥 Find highly-rated content that isn't so well-known Built with zero code using Polymer Search.
item.content:encoded: We built the best way to find hidden gems on Netflix: 💯 Only top-rated movies and shows are included. No junk 🔍 The only way to explore thousands of attributes 🎥 Find highly-rated content that isn't so well-known Built with zero code using Polymer Search.

item.title: App Marketer's Playbook for iOS 15 - Grow your app revenue with actionable insights
item.description: Filled with insights from industry-leading companies and experts, our latest guide covers everything you need to know about the new era of mobile growth in the App Store.
item.content:encoded: Filled with insights from industry-leading companies and experts, our latest guide covers everything you need to know about the new era of mobile growth in the App Store.

item.title: Tact - A simple chat app
item.description: Tact is a simple native chat app for iOS, iPadOS and macOS. It works with iCloud and does not require you to create an account — this means it is private and free of unwanted connections.
item.content:encoded: Tact is a simple native chat app for iOS, iPadOS and macOS. It works with iCloud and does not require you to create an account — this means it is private and free of unwanted connections.

item.title: alertss - Simple popups that increase conversions
item.description: Simplicity always wins. Create subtle, but powerful popups that increase conversions without ruining user experience. Get more leads. Create more FOMO. Increase conversions in a few clicks.
item.content:encoded: Simplicity always wins. Create subtle, but powerful popups that increase conversions without ruining user experience. Get more leads. Create more FOMO. Increase conversions in a few clicks.

item.title: PunkScape Builder - Build and own your banner on Twitter, OpenSea, Discord
item.description: The imbalance is obvious: #PFP (profile photo) NFTs are everywhere. #PFBs (profile banners) are the next frontier. PunkScapes are a collection of 10.000 unique landscapes stored on the Ethereum Blockchain. Perfect as Twitter, Discord and OpenSea banners.
item.content:encoded: The imbalance is obvious: #PFP (profile photo) NFTs are everywhere. #PFBs (profile banners) are the next frontier. PunkScapes are a collection of 10.000 unique landscapes stored on the Ethereum Blockchain. Perfect as Twitter, Discord and OpenSea banners.

item.title: Vmaker Learners Hub - Learn new software skills from tailored videos
item.description: A free platform that has the best tutorials for different software hand-picked from YouTube. Learners can now find the best videos without having to scroll through multiple videos and creators can increase their video reach for their content.
item.content:encoded: A free platform that has the best tutorials for different software hand-picked from YouTube. Learners can now find the best videos without having to scroll through multiple videos and creators can increase their video reach for their content.

item.title: ColorHuddle - Ready-to-use color palettes with live previews
item.description: Meet ColorHuddle – a free collection of 11 hand-crafted, ready-to-use color palettes with a live landing page example. Simply click on any element on the page to copy its color 🌈
item.content:encoded: Meet ColorHuddle – a free collection of 11 hand-crafted, ready-to-use color palettes with a live landing page example. Simply click on any element on the page to copy its color 🌈

item.title: SamosaBot by Threado - A Slackbot to grow gratitude in your community
item.description: Gratitude is that thing we always love to feel more of & always feels great to give more of. So why not make it easier to do? We made this FREE Slackbot to help do that. SamosaBot by Threado is a fun, simple way to give gratitude in your Slack community.
item.content:encoded: Gratitude is that thing we always love to feel more of & always feels great to give more of. So why not make it easier to do? We made this FREE Slackbot to help do that. SamosaBot by Threado is a fun, simple way to give gratitude in your Slack community.

item.title: Ambire Wallet - Speed up your DeFi Experience and automate gas management
item.description: Ambire Wallet is the first DeFi cryptocurrency wallet that combines power with ease of use, solving common pain points of DeFi. Available on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche and BSC.
item.content:encoded: Ambire Wallet is the first DeFi cryptocurrency wallet that combines power with ease of use, solving common pain points of DeFi. Available on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche and BSC.

item.title: Get Funded with Finmark - Get matched with dozens of top investors
item.description: Finmark has partnered with dozens of the best early-stage investors across the globe to help founders get funded faster. Upload your pitch deck into Finmark and get matched with investors like Bessemer, Village Global, Draper & Associates, and more.
item.content:encoded: Finmark has partnered with dozens of the best early-stage investors across the globe to help founders get funded faster. Upload your pitch deck into Finmark and get matched with investors like Bessemer, Village Global, Draper & Associates, and more.

item.title: Modern Data Stack - One platform for all things about the modern data stack
item.description: A platform for everything you need to know about the Modern Data Stack ⭐️ Companies & Categories shaping the Modern Data Stack 📚 Data stacks of the world's top companies 📖 Resources to get updates on the latest in this space 🛠 Jobs in data engineering
item.content:encoded: A platform for everything you need to know about the Modern Data Stack ⭐️ Companies & Categories shaping the Modern Data Stack 📚 Data stacks of the world's top companies 📖 Resources to get updates on the latest in this space 🛠 Jobs in data engineering

item.title: Crypto-as-a-service by Mudrex - Offer crypto services to your customers, without overheads
item.description: With Mudrex’s Crypto-as-a-Service platform, fintech enterprises, super apps, portfolio management services, etc. can provide simple yet secure crypto exposure to their customers without worrying about the compliances and the technology.
item.content:encoded: With Mudrex’s Crypto-as-a-Service platform, fintech enterprises, super apps, portfolio management services, etc. can provide simple yet secure crypto exposure to their customers without worrying about the compliances and the technology.

item.title: Happyō - Social platform uniting people through real life actions
item.description: Happyō is a completely new social experience - video platform uniting people through real life actions. To get your INVITE, download the app from the AppStore and press this LINK to register an account: https://ppa.happyo.app/share/invite/CQMTTD32
item.content:encoded: Happyō is a completely new social experience - video platform uniting people through real life actions. To get your INVITE, download the app from the AppStore and press this LINK to register an account: https://ppa.happyo.app/share/invite/CQMTTD32

item.title: Simfolio - Forecast your future net worth, stay on top of your finances
item.description: Simfolio is a tool that shows you how all your investment accounts will grow together to give you an idea of your future net worth. Along with projections, the app lets you compare your account performance to benchmarks.
item.content:encoded: Simfolio is a tool that shows you how all your investment accounts will grow together to give you an idea of your future net worth. Along with projections, the app lets you compare your account performance to benchmarks.

item.title: Apple Music Wrapped - A Spotify Wrapped for Apple Music users.
item.description: If you're an Apple Music user like me, you felt left out during Spotify Wrapped season🥲. Yes we had Replay but I think we all wanted a bit more. So in 8 days I built something much more fun and in depth😁Hope you enjoy!
item.content:encoded: If you're an Apple Music user like me, you felt left out during Spotify Wrapped season🥲. Yes we had Replay but I think we all wanted a bit more. So in 8 days I built something much more fun and in depth😁Hope you enjoy!

item.title: CoFinds - Pitch your startup in 200 characters & find your co-founder
item.description: Find cofounders, founding team or other professionals by pitching your startup in 200 characters or less.
item.content:encoded: Find cofounders, founding team or other professionals by pitching your startup in 200 characters or less.

item.title: mmmotif - SVG generator for isometric 3D-like patterns
item.description: An SVG generator that makes it easy to generate patterns of shapes that have a 3D look and feel, thanks to isometric design.
item.content:encoded: An SVG generator that makes it easy to generate patterns of shapes that have a 3D look and feel, thanks to isometric design.

item.title: Ground Zero - Reset macOS apps back to their original installed state
item.description: Return an app to the state it was in when it was first installed, without deleting the app. Fix issues and get back the default settings. Reclaim disk space by cleaning up data that would normally be left behind when uninstalling an app.
item.content:encoded: Return an app to the state it was in when it was first installed, without deleting the app. Fix issues and get back the default settings. Reclaim disk space by cleaning up data that would normally be left behind when uninstalling an app.

item.title: Feedir - There are thousands of job Tweets each week with < 5 likes
item.description: Feedir makes it easy to find job listings on Twitter. From the click of a button you will be shown tweets from companies hiring today.
item.content:encoded: Feedir makes it easy to find job listings on Twitter. From the click of a button you will be shown tweets from companies hiring today.

item.title: Sensorpad - Monitoring and reporting tool for cron jobs & data pipelines
item.description: Event-based 💡 monitoring and 📈 reporting tool for cron jobs, data pipelines,CI & CD builds according to the rules you set up. You hardly need any programming knowledge to set up such monitoring.
item.content:encoded: Event-based 💡 monitoring and 📈 reporting tool for cron jobs, data pipelines,CI & CD builds according to the rules you set up. You hardly need any programming knowledge to set up such monitoring.

item.title: Crypto for Charity - Donate crypto, save on taxes, make a difference
item.description: Today, the vast majority of charities have no technical capacity to accept crypto donations. Crypto for Charity unlocks access to the $2+ trillion crypto market by making it safe, quick, and tax-efficient to donate to essentially any 501(c)3 charity in the US.
item.content:encoded: Today, the vast majority of charities have no technical capacity to accept crypto donations. Crypto for Charity unlocks access to the $2+ trillion crypto market by making it safe, quick, and tax-efficient to donate to essentially any 501(c)3 charity in the US.

item.title: iStock inside InVideo - High quality stock footage at a fraction of cost in InVideo
item.description: iStock provides 5M+ premium stock videos and it’s now available inside InVideo. InVideo makes the user journey to create B-rolls or to just use stock videos 10X easier and cheaper
item.content:encoded: iStock provides 5M+ premium stock videos and it’s now available inside InVideo. InVideo makes the user journey to create B-rolls or to just use stock videos 10X easier and cheaper

item.title: EduDo 2.0 - Video-based discussions platform
item.description: EduDo is a video discussion platform
item.content:encoded: EduDo is a video discussion platform

item.title: 5 Minutes Daily Sketching Community - Feel creative and happy with 5 minutes of daily sketching
item.description: Let your creativity flow with just 5 minutes of daily sketching. 👩‍🎨 Ideal for beginners, amateurs and hobbyists 🥳 A community of 4000+ folks to keep you motivated 🚀 Leaderboard, streak tracking 💡 New ideas, discussion and events
item.content:encoded: Let your creativity flow with just 5 minutes of daily sketching. 👩‍🎨 Ideal for beginners, amateurs and hobbyists 🥳 A community of 4000+ folks to keep you motivated 🚀 Leaderboard, streak tracking 💡 New ideas, discussion and events

item.title: OSINT Tool - Chrome extension looks up phone/email/IP/people via APIs
item.description: OSINT-tool.com is two things. 1) A website where you can look up things using either public available links, or your favorite enrichment provider via APIs and 2) a Chrome extension that allows you highlight text or images and enrich it using 1)
item.content:encoded: OSINT-tool.com is two things. 1) A website where you can look up things using either public available links, or your favorite enrichment provider via APIs and 2) a Chrome extension that allows you highlight text or images and enrich it using 1)

item.title: Christmas Raffle - Organize a raffle for Christmas
item.description: You can easily organize a raffle via yilbasicekilisi.online, send matching results to participants' emails.
item.content:encoded: You can easily organize a raffle via yilbasicekilisi.online, send matching results to participants' emails.

item.title: ParrotBay - HTTP request inspection, mocked API response, HTTP proxy
item.description: ParrotBay provides a unique URL that you can execute any type of HTTP requests against it. allows you to inspect your HTTP requests, design webhooks, and mimic your entire backend endpoints with static and dynamic JSON responses.
item.content:encoded: ParrotBay provides a unique URL that you can execute any type of HTTP requests against it. allows you to inspect your HTTP requests, design webhooks, and mimic your entire backend endpoints with static and dynamic JSON responses.

item.title: Travelcase - Workations simplified, quick guides from travel influencers
item.description: Planning travel is hard, workations even more so. What if the top travel influencers planned your workation and vacation experiences? Blogs, too long Reels, too short Travelcase, just right Quick comprehensive guides to get you to your next destination!
item.content:encoded: Planning travel is hard, workations even more so. What if the top travel influencers planned your workation and vacation experiences? Blogs, too long Reels, too short Travelcase, just right Quick comprehensive guides to get you to your next destination!

item.title: EmailEngine - Access any email account to receive/send emails with an API
item.description: EmailEngine is a self-hosted application that opens IMAP and SMTP connections against registered email accounts to translate API requests to IMAP commands, send emails, and monitor changes on these accounts. It sends a webhook for every update on the account.
item.content:encoded: EmailEngine is a self-hosted application that opens IMAP and SMTP connections against registered email accounts to translate API requests to IMAP commands, send emails, and monitor changes on these accounts. It sends a webhook for every update on the account.

item.title: OtpNinja - Setup OTP API easily
item.description: OtpNinja is a Plug and play Otp service for Apps And businesses who wish to add 2Auth layer and send code Verification By sms for their clients. The Api is super easy creates and send the code by SMS also send back to the app the Verification results.
item.content:encoded: OtpNinja is a Plug and play Otp service for Apps And businesses who wish to add 2Auth layer and send code Verification By sms for their clients. The Api is super easy creates and send the code by SMS also send back to the app the Verification results.

item.title: WebBag - Educational platform for easy learning
item.description: With the help of our product, you can no longer carry a heavy briefcase. Books, notebooks, diaries and tests will be available in just one click
item.content:encoded: With the help of our product, you can no longer carry a heavy briefcase. Books, notebooks, diaries and tests will be available in just one click

item.title: GetMails - Making cold outreach simple for everyone
item.description: We hated cold outreach because most of the tools are either too complicated or they need a lot of other tools parallel to make the outreach work. So, we decided to simplify the cold outreach process for marketers. Welcome to GetMails Family ❤️
item.content:encoded: We hated cold outreach because most of the tools are either too complicated or they need a lot of other tools parallel to make the outreach work. So, we decided to simplify the cold outreach process for marketers. Welcome to GetMails Family ❤️

item.title: Santa Hat Profile Pic Maker - Add a Christmas Santa hat on your profile picture for free
item.description: Celebrate 2021 Christmas by adding a Santa hat to your social media profile picture on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Tiktok. We remove your background & add cool background images & effects automatically!
item.content:encoded: Celebrate 2021 Christmas by adding a Santa hat to your social media profile picture on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Tiktok. We remove your background & add cool background images & effects automatically!

item.title: Paperback - Simpler and tidier alternative to wiki pages
item.description: Paperback is a simpler and tidier alternative to wiki pages. Instead of burying stuff in deep hierarchies, it lets you create concise lists with your links, files, and notes. Then, people can actually find what they need, instead of asking around all the time.
item.content:encoded: Paperback is a simpler and tidier alternative to wiki pages. Instead of burying stuff in deep hierarchies, it lets you create concise lists with your links, files, and notes. Then, people can actually find what they need, instead of asking around all the time.

item.title: Incoggo - Free ad blocker for paywalls
item.description: - ⛔️ Incoggo is a free adblocker for paywalls. Available for Mac, coming soon for Windows! - 📚 Automatically unlock news and articles for free and get easier access to news and information! - 🗞️ 15+ top pubs unlocked. Full list at go.incoggo.com/pubs
item.content:encoded: - ⛔️ Incoggo is a free adblocker for paywalls. Available for Mac, coming soon for Windows! - 📚 Automatically unlock news and articles for free and get easier access to news and information! - 🗞️ 15+ top pubs unlocked. Full list at go.incoggo.com/pubs

item.title: Hypervault - Securely manage and share sensitive data with your team
item.description: Say goodbye to flat text “secure notes” to store anything that’s not a password. Hypervault offers the solution for businesses to securely store, share and organize many types of sensitive data, not just passwords. Great for IT, Devs, Agencies, and Startups!
item.content:encoded: Say goodbye to flat text “secure notes” to store anything that’s not a password. Hypervault offers the solution for businesses to securely store, share and organize many types of sensitive data, not just passwords. Great for IT, Devs, Agencies, and Startups!

item.title: QRToon - Toonified QR Maker
item.description: Turn your boring QR codes into catchy artworks. No worries, they will still work the same way as your original codes. Just provide a QR code and a selfie and get ready to share its Toon version with everybody!
item.content:encoded: Turn your boring QR codes into catchy artworks. No worries, they will still work the same way as your original codes. Just provide a QR code and a selfie and get ready to share its Toon version with everybody!
